argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | deg1z.d | |- D = ( deg1 ` R ) |
| 2 |  | deg1z.p | |- P = ( Poly1 ` R ) |
| 3 |  | deg1z.z | |- .0. = ( 0g ` P ) |
| 4 |  | deg1nn0cl.b | |- B = ( Base ` P ) |
| 5 | 1 | #P_deg1fval | |- D = ( 1o mDeg R ) |
| 6 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( 1o mPoly R ) = ( 1o mPoly R ) |
| 7 | 6, 2, 3 | #P_ply1mpl0 | |- .0. = ( 0g ` ( 1o mPoly R ) ) |
| 8 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( PwSer1 ` R ) = ( PwSer1 ` R ) |
| 9 | 2, 8, 4 | #P_ply1bas | |- B = ( Base ` ( 1o mPoly R ) ) |
| 10 | 5, 6, 7, 9 | #P_mdegnn0cl | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ F e. B /\ F =/= .0. ) -> ( D ` F ) e. NN0 ) |
